attributes.action: immediately reduce the road fuel duty/tax to a more realistic level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have the Highest ratio of duty to cost of any nation in the european union. The Fuel duty is completely disproportionate to the cost of exploration and production of fuel.The continued increases in duty and oil prices have pushed the price of fuels at the pumps to record highs and the knock on effect for consumers and business will have a detrimental effect on the economy as well as making essential travel a serious problem for isolated and rural communities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
